name: Chicken-Stuffed Mushrooms
author: Diamond Crystal Salt
summary: Mushroom caps filled with a creamy onion, garlic, and diced chicken mixture are baked until piping hot for a crowd-pleasing party appetizer.
ingredients: 1 pound medium button or mini-bella mushrooms
1  cooked boneless chicken breast half, finely diced*
1 ½ tablespoons Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt
1 tablespoon finely shredded mozzarella or Parmesan cheese
directions: Remove stems from mushrooms, but do not discard
Using a small melon baller, scoop out insides of mushrooms, leaving at least half shell to allow more room for filling
Finely chop mushroom stems and centers
Melt butter over medium heat in large skillet
Add onion and garlic; cook 1 minute
Stir in chicken, chopped mushrooms, Diamond Crystal® Kosher Salt, and pepper
Blend in flour, cream and 3 tablespoons parsley
Cook and stir until bubbly and thickened
Spoon mixture evenly into mushroom caps
Place in lightly oiled, shallow baking dish
Top with remaining 2 tablespoons parsley and garnish with mozzarella or Parmesan cheese, if desired
Bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until hot and cheese melts
Garnish with additional parsley, if desired
